items.title: The Master Course: Sell One Time Offers, Upsells & Downsells
items.headline: OTOs & upsells can 2X your business overnight. Growth hacking, online marketing, sales skills, email etiquette & more!
objectives_summary: You'll know how to upsell, downsell, cross-sell products if you have good sales skills.
You'll know how to upsell another product IMMEDIATELY after the initial sale WITHOUT pissing your customers off if you have good sales skills.
You'll know how to communicate with your audience using your sales skills,once you have their email address.

objectives_summary: The fundamentals of Integrated Marketing from past to present.
Dive deeper into integrated marketing communication and campaign strategy.
How to create an integrated marketing campaign from start to finish.

items.title: The Free + Shipping Sales Funnel

objectives_summary: You'll know how to sell front-end products with your sales funnel.
You'll know how to build a sales funnel with ClickFunnels.
You'll know how to structure your sales funnels to make the most profit from every visitor.

items.title: 13 Easy Ways to Get Traffic to Your Website
items.headline: Drive new website traffic in ANY niche with these underutilized FREE and paid platforms.
objectives_summary: Choose the right traffic source for their website needs.
Find audiences in their niche using one of the traffic sources taught.
Drive traffic to any website property for increased opt-ins, sales and subscribers.

objectives_summary: Understand marketing for small businesses

Create a marketing action plan

items.title: SEO Keyword Research That Finds Buyers Instantly
items.headline: Advanced SEO keyword research for organic, social media and pay per click. Good keywords = good rankings = good traffic.
objectives_summary: You will know how to utilize Google's Keyword Planner to identify/research niche keywords within your market.
You will know how to select high competition, medium competition & low competition keywords for your website after you learn the accurate method of keyword research.
You will know how to find the keyword's search volume in this keyword research course.
